review.title: “Awesome environment!”
review.pros: Pros – -Family-owned small salon with fun and inviting family atmosphere-No product charges for stylists-50/50 commission for stylist-Not "cookie cutter" like other salons, employees are allowed and encouraged to express their individuality.-friendly staff
review.cons: Cons – - Holidays can bring on long hours, but it's definitely worth the pay.- Understaffed.- No health insurance- No paid vacation
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – - Do more online business! Hire More stylists!
